original_text: It is like things that you bring out of a room where you keep them. The good man says good things because he keeps good thoughts in his mind. The bad man says bad things because he keeps bad thoughts in his mind.
korean_text: 선한 사람은 그 쌓은 선에서 선한 것을 내고 악한 사람은 그 쌓은 악에서 악한 것을 내느니라

sentences.original_text: It is like things that you bring out
out of a room where you keep them
The good man says good things
because he keeps good thoughts in his mind
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 마음속에 선한 생각을 간직하기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: The bad man says bad things
because he keeps bad thoughts in his mind
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 마음속에 악한 생각을 간직하기 때문입니다
